author: trent_vanepps
content:
list of ETH2 related talks at today's ETHOnline ðŸ”® The Future of Ethereum Summit. Don't miss them!!

13:00 ET - Catalyst - an Eth1 engine for Eth2 w/ Guillaume Ballet
13:30 ET - A Developer's Guide to Account Abstraction w/ Sam Wilson & Ansgar Dietrich
14:00 ET - The Future of Solidity w/ Alex Beregszaszi
15:00 ET - EIP 1559 Overview w/ Tim Beiko
16:30 ET - Secret-shared validator infrastructure for Eth2.0 w/ Aditya Asgaonkar
17:00 ET - Intro to Eth2 & Staking for Beginners w/ Superphiz
17:30 ET - Eth 2 sweet tooth: rollups and date-a availability w/ Ben Jones

Full schedule at ethonline.org/future

Join us here: https://live.ethonline.org
